PERFECT STACKING GIFT FOR TODDLERS – Bring joy this Christmas 2025, New Year, or birthday with a delightful stacking toy that sparks imagination and learning. name: 17 PCs Multicolor Nesting and Stacking Cups Set, Baby Bathtub Toys, Early Learning Educational Toys for Infants, Toddlers, Stacking Cups with The Numbers, Shapes, Fruits, Animals Patten
product_description: Stacking Cups Set for Toddlers and BabiesThe stacking toy set is a playing toy and a great learning tool for toddlers. Babies and Toddlers can learn the concept of colors, sizes, numbers, animals, shapes, sequences while playing with the stacking toy set. Moreover, stacking toy set train babies’ fine motor skills, hand-eye coordination, developing children's imagination.Making more FunThe stacking toy set provides more fun for babies. Toddlers can stack up cups to build towers, make it as high as 5.95 inches. Knock them down for fun. Each cup and spoon has drain holes at the bottom in order to see water flow out from the bottom. The distribution of drain holes at the bottom of 6 spoons is designed differently allows water to drain out at different speeds and methods so that providing more fun for babies. Baby likes to scoop water, spill water, pour water. And they like to see water run through one object from another. It can be played on different occasions such as indoor, outdoor, bath time, beach time, traveling. It is small in size, and light in weight, specially designed for baby's small hands, so the baby can take it wherever they go.Early Education Learning ToyThe simple design of stacking cups has a significant educational meaning. Bright color cups arouse children's color awareness. Stacking and nesting cups teach toddlers size and order is important. Numbers are printed on the side of each cup to cultivate children's math awareness. Fruit patterns show different kinds of fruits to toddlers. Animal recognition teaches babies the world is a diverse environment. Stacking cups train babies' fine motor skills and develop hand-eye coordination. Different stacking methods also train babies’ brains, especially the imagination ability. Stacking games also cultivates babies' focus ability and good for personality cultivation. Get it for your little lovely babies as a gift!

name: 8 Pcs Stacking Cups for Rabbits,Nesting Rabbit Toys of Different Sizes,Bunny Stacking Cups for Hiding Food and Playing,Guinea Pig Stacking Cups (Rainbow)
short_description: Encourages Exploration: Designed with raised edges at the bottom to hide food, these stacking cups encourage rabbits to explore and develop slow eating habits. Small holes allow your bunny to sniff out treats, making mealtime fun.

Reduces Boredom:Keep your bunny engaged with exciting activities that satisfy their natural curiosity. This toy helps eliminate boredom, reduce destructive behaviors, and create a calmer home environment.
Safe & Durable: Made from high-quality plastic, these stacking cups are sturdy, non-toxic, and reusable. They are designed to withstand daily use and are easy to clean for a safe playtime experience.
Bright Design:Each set includes cups in vibrant rainbow-like colors that excite small animals without causing irritation. Note: The colors of different sizes of cups are random.
Compact & Space-Saving: Includes 8 stackable cups of varying sizes. When inverted, the set stacks up to 13.5 inches tall; when upright, it measures 3.7 inches for easy storage.
product_description: Crafted to encourage exploration and promote healthy eating habits, these stacking cups are designed with raised edges at the bottom to cleverly hide food. Small holes allow your bunny to sniff out treats, turning mealtime into an engaging activity that stimulates their natural curiosity. This innovative design not only promotes slow eating but also keeps your rabbit entertained and mentally engaged. By satisfying their instinct to forage, these cups help reduce boredom and destructive behaviors, creating a calmer and happier environment for both you and your pet. Made from high-quality plastic, these stacking cups are durable, non-toxic, and reusable, ensuring they withstand daily use while remaining safe for your bunny. Cleaning is effortless, allowing you to maintain a hygienic playtime experience without hassle. The vibrant rainbow-like colors of the cups add excitement to your pet's environment without causing irritation, making them visually appealing for small animals. Please note that the colors of cups in different sizes are random, adding a touch of surprise to the set. This stacking cup set includes 8 cups of varying sizes, offering versatility in play and storage. When inverted, the cups stack up to 13.5 inches tall, while upright, they measure a compact 3.7 inches, making them easy to store and perfect for small spaces. Whether used for playtime or mealtime, these cups provide endless opportunities for your bunny to explore, sniff, and enjoy treats in a safe and stimulating way.
